header.title: Hagicode Docker Compose Builder
header.subtitle: Generate Docker Compose configurations for Hagicode

configForm.title: Docker Compose Configuration Generator
configForm.subtitle: Configure your Hagicode Docker Compose setup
configForm.quickStartDescription: Get started quickly with minimal configuration
configForm.fullCustomDescription: Complete control over all configuration options
configForm.profileHelp: Choose your configuration experience. You can switch modes at any time.
configForm.dockerHubNetworkAdvice: Suitable for users with Docker Hub mirror acceleration support
configForm.azureAcrDescription: Alternative image registry, synced with Docker Hub
configForm.azureAcrNetworkAdvice: Suitable for users who cannot access Docker Hub locally
configForm.unifiedUseOfToken: Unified use of ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable
configForm.apiEndpointAutoSet: API Endpoint will be automatically set to ZAI API URL
configForm.usingOfficialApi: Using Anthropic official API, no need to set ANTHROPIC_URL
configForm.workdirDescription: Work directory points to a folder containing your code repositories. We will scan multiple repositories within this folder and it will be mapped to /app/workdir inside the container.
configForm.workdirRecommendation: ðŸ’¡ Recommendation: Point to a parent folder that contains multiple repositories (e.g., /home/user/repos or C:\Users\YourName\source\repos). The application will scan all subfolders to detect repositories.
configForm.workdirCreatedByRoot: Work directory created by root user
configForm.permissionIssueDescription: The work directory was created by root user, which will prevent the container from writing files. Please choose one of the following solutions:
configForm.createNonRootUser: Create a non-root user and use that user to create the directory
configForm.configureUserPermissionDescription: To solve file permission issues inside and outside the container, you need to configure PUID and PGID. Use the user ID and group ID of the user who created the work directory.
configForm.permissionNotRequiredDescription: When workdir is created by root, permission mapping is not required.

configPreview.basedOnSettings: This configuration is based on your settings above.

backToTop.ariaLabel: Scroll back to top of page
